title: i know why Riot decide to give Ornn more power
body: Because they are planning to release a new skin and its gonna be Santa Ornn with an huge reindeer on his ultimate

replies.body: Memes aside, that is a pretty good skin idea actually.
I have a better idea. A legendary skin that summons a train. He is a train conductor.
Ideally with taunts directed at Mecha Zero Sion.

Jokes with allied Mecha Zero Sion, as well.

Siornn Bot Lane OP.
Two of my friends actually played Sion+Ornn bot lane a few times, it wasn't bad

In Sweden we have a city where they around Christmas create a large goat made out of straw in reference to ..... something i dont personally recall.

But, the sort of amusing thing is that whenever its not carefully guarded at all times then some sneaky fellows have basically set it on fire every year for the past...37 or so?

Its not supposed to happen by any means, rather its illegal and considered a pretty grave offense however some people have found ways to do it anyway......because the police dont really find themselves wanting to stand guard in the middle of a blizzard but the arsons found the time good for some oil and tinder. 


So if Ornn gets a Christmas skin where he summons a giant burning goat? Swedish league players will get to chuckle a bit :P
And here I thought Teemo was the real satan.

"Grumpy Santa Ornn"

> [{quoted}](name=Hextech OwI,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6QanUAdG,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2018-11-09T18:04:17.744+0000)
>
> "Grumpy Santa Ornn"

"Happy Snowdown Santa! What did I get!?"

"Socks."

"...Oh. like are they colorful socks with frilly patterns an-"

"Plain white socks."

"...Oh....ok...."

"Mmhmm."
And they should buff Ornn with a corresponding Masterwork Boots of Speed (not for any of its upgrades).
at least they'll be socks of epic quality
AND HE BUILDS TOYS IN HIS RECALL
Just to add more variety to Ornnhub.
Christmas Ornnament

Holy shit.
I want that. >:O
Santa Ornn. He knows when you've been naughty.
nah, they did reindeer 2 year in a row, time for snowbunny kalista and festive ivern :p

Did Ornn get buffed recently? I played a game earlier as Tryndamere and just got absolutely destroyed by this Ornn, he wouldn't take any damage and when I tried to attack him he'd use his W and take off almost half my health, it was really strange

That one's on you. OP is talking about changes on the PBE.

EDIT: Ironically enough, they're actually making Ornn less Tanky in lane.
I expected an Ornnhub and NoNut November reference
that's whatsup, make it happen rito :3
That's pure fgotry btw
i hope not, It's a theme that many of us don't like.
No theme is going to be liked by everyone. Should skin production be halted altogether then?
